attributes.action: All debt management companies must offer clients the opportunity for free debt management plans
attributes.additional_details: All commercial debt management companies must respect that its clients are in a position where they have a minimum amount of money they can offer to pay to their creditors.  This should mean that the company has to offer the client the option for a free debt management plan.  For example, http://www.eveshamdebtadvisors.co.uk/ is a commercial debt management company, but through one of its sister companies, http://www.debt-managementplan.net/ the clients do have access to a totally free debt management service which is fully supported.  By doing this, 100% of the payment by the client is given over to their creditors.  This means the client will get debt free a lot quicker.
